fields.name: When will Virtual Console games be supported?
fields.value:
**For PKSM**: PKSM v10 now supports generation 1 and 2 editing! Please make sure you are using [the latest release](https://github.com/FlagBrew/PKSM/releases/latest).
**For Checkpoint**: NES, SNES, GB, and GBC are supported. However, GBA is not currently supported. You can back up your GBA saves using [GodMode9](https://3ds.hacks.guide/dumping-titles-and-game-cartridges#backup-gba-vc-saves).

fields.name: Why do I have to wait so long for new releases?
fields.value: Because you think you're entitled to everything.

fields.name: I have Homebrew/*hax. Why can't I launch any Flagbrew apps?
fields.value: All FlagBrew apps *require* CFW to function. **There is no viable reason to not install CFW nowadays, as there is a free method.** You can follow [this guide](https://3ds.hacks.guide) to install CFW on your 3ds.

footer.text: Please note: DMing users asking how to access the assistance channels will lead to you receiving two warns.

fields.name: I can't access any of the channels in the FlagBrew category!
fields.value: You need to toggle the `FlagBrew Updates` role to access these channels. Information on how to toggle these can be found in <#278223623175798794>.
